meaningMnemonic: The kanji is <kanji>work</kanji> which means this verb has something to do with working. It's not straight up "to work," instead it's "<vocabulary>to work for</vocabulary>" or "<vocabulary>to be employed at</vocabulary>."
readingMnemonic: The reading is the same as the other word that means "to work for" (務める). Remember this and you'll be able to remember the reading for this word too.
